com.clearblade.platform.api
Class Item

java.lang.Object
  com.clearblade.platform.api.Item

public class Item
extends java.lang.Object

This class consists exclusively of instance methods that operate on ClearBlade Items.

ClearBlade Items are objects that create, modify, and delete data in the Cloud Platform. A typical example would be: 

 
 Item item = new Item("CollectionId");
 item.set("property", "value");
 item.save( new DataCallback(){








Since:

  
1.0


Author:

  
Clyde Byrd, Aaron Allsbrook


See Also:
Collection, 
Query, 
ClearBladeException

destroy


public void destroy(DataCallback callback)




Deletes an Item from the collection it belongs to in the Cloud asynchronously.






Throws:

ClearBladeException - will be thrown if the Item was not found or API call failed

getArray


public java.lang.Object[] getArray(java.lang.String property,

 If property not found null is returned
 *Only retrieve types like Integer, Double,Boolean,String, and Long*

load


public void load(java.lang.String itemId,
                 DataCallback callback)
          throws ClearBladeException




Retrieves and loads the value of the Item specified by the ItemId given from the Cloud Synchronously
 Use only if you plan to do your own threading





Parameters:
itemId - the Id of the Item to retrieve from the ClearBlade Cloud

Throws:

ClearBladeException - will be thrown if no Item is found or if the API call failed










loadSync


public void loadSync(java.lang.String itemId)
              throws ClearBladeException







Throws:

ClearBladeException










save


public void save(DataCallback callback)




If Item has not been saved to the Cloud, it will save it, otherwise it
 will modify the Item in the cloud.
 It loads the value of the Item from the Cloud with the most up-to-date
 Item. After creation of an Item it will have a ItemId.
 This function operates Synchronously.
 Use only if you plan to do your own threading






Throws:

ClearBladeException - will be thrown if no Item is found or if the API call failed










saveSync


public Item[] saveSync()
                throws ClearBladeException







Throws:

ClearBladeException
